mapper.update: UPDATE t_project SET join_count = join_count + 1 WHERE prj_seq = #{prj_seq} AND EXISTS ( SELECT prj_seq FROM t_participant WHERE prj_seq = #{prj_seq} AND t_id = #{t_id})

choose.when: UPDATE t_project SET join_count = join_count + 0 WHERE prj_seq = #{prj_seq} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_participant WHERE prj_seq = #{prj_seq} AND t_id = #{t_id})
choose.otherwise: UPDATE t_project SET join_count = join_count-1 WHERE prj_seq = #{prj_seq} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_participant WHERE prj_seq = #{prj_seq} AND t_id = #{t_id})
